content:
Grand Jury
No Double Jeopardy
Right Against Self Incrimination
Due Process - the governments' rules have to apply to everyone and have to apply to everyone
Eminent Domain - balancing(?) the right of the government to take private property land for the better of society
	eg if there is a train that needs to be built, government can take your property

Lanza vs. US
Miranda vs. Arizona
	Miranda rights
Kelo(?) vs. New London
